display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

[media]
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

[media]
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

[media]
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.

# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_751061897295113_399559700241501768_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=oPJrkwhCMcwQ7kNvwHpV_Yf&_nc_oc=Adn6vW2G9MS2XOw7dHopk6IWbewTQkQfESqXqMQteXGsYBT78GtoY9bhg8otmEpswEo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Fg_PTmBEQy4ttNCfRLzI-w&oh=00_AfvYLgl2jcdjjhwaglwGBxUEVunmAsrL7Bq1v02PzCAJfw&oe=6995C019)
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491823763_4154099168195233_6412607577589191733_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=6FWlwb-6q70Q7kNvwG3lx92&_nc_oc=AdmbKqw6SIZEg3CTT8cj2rUErqOrfiTyIpnpbWKG3r_hi8zKgf8c7Cf7kYVTfPLimH0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Fg_PTmBEQy4ttNCfRLzI-w&oh=00_AfsrTJ_Nze0kR1rkFxj6zTS6bOBBXzLrzJLvvtNBtW7aiQ&oe=6995D8DE)
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820987_1099167878797501_6609429194438124224_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=GDQlNcD8MdkQ7kNvwGZu0xD&_nc_oc=AdnP1PjX9tCP8nJNe7SD1uTkhhj81UWuDeBcJ019LQ_mW43VdS_fDCO4UnW_uUyNjbg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Fg_PTmBEQy4ttNCfRLzI-w&oh=00_AfsiQf7c_nwAiKzCFvVBthC4ag9pddRokGkwOlu05pzc6g&oe=6995B94A)
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.
